scripts.build:android:preview: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=false ./gradlew assembleRelease && mkdir -p ../builds/preview && mv app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../builds/preview/android.apk
scripts.build:android:development: cd android && NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=false ./gradlew assembleDebug && mkdir -p ../builds/development && mv app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk ../builds/development/android.apk
scripts.build:ios:preview: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Release -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/preview && tar -czf ../builds/preview/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.build:ios:development: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install && xcodebuild -workspace SherloRNExample.xcworkspace -derivedDataPath app -configuration Debug -scheme SherloRNExample -destination="generic/platform=iOS Simulator" -sdk iphonesimulator && mkdir -p ../builds/development && tar -czf ../builds/development/ios.tar.gz -C app/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:preview: tar -xzvf builds/preview/ios.tar.gz -C builds/preview && xcrun simctl install booted builds/preview/SherloRNExample.app
scripts.install:ios:development: tar -xzvf builds/development/ios.tar.gz -C builds/development && xcrun simctl install booted builds/development/SherloRNExample.app
